EmailTemplate.subject: MX 2013 - Final Payment Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Happy Wednesday!
I hope everyone is ready for an amazing long weekend ahead of us. From the looks of it, it will be a hot and sunny weekend for those who live in the Greater Toronto Area, hopefully everyone else will be just as lucky!
This is just a quick reminder that your final payment is coming up in 2 weeks on June 1st, 2013. By now, everyone should have already made a $300 deposit to secure a spot on the trip.
If you are wondering how much you have in your account, please respond to this e-mail and I will be able to help you.
Have an awesome long weekend everyone!
Sincerely,
Joy Yu
